meanings.sent1: Tommy is such a boobie when he forgets his homework at home.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a boobie and double-check your work before submitting it.
meanings.sent3: The class clown always acts like a boobie to make everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His decision to skip the exam was a real boobie move.
meanings.sent5: Being a boobie in class won't get you good grades.

meanings.definition: A slang term for a woman's breast.
meanings.sent1: The magazine cover featured a model showing off her boobie in a revealing dress.
meanings.sent2: She felt self-conscious about her boobies and wore a high-neck top.
meanings.sent3: The baby couldn't stop staring at his mom's boobie during feeding time.
meanings.sent4: The necklace pendant was shaped like a shiny boobie.
meanings.sent5: The beachgoer accidentally got sunscreen on her boobie.
